articles.title: Delhi Excise Policy: Govt may allow wholesalers to set up just one lab for testing liquor
articles.description: The Excise Policy being framed by the government for 2022-23 is likely to allow a wholesale licensee (L-1) to set up just one lab, instead of a lab at each warehouse owned by the licensee, officials said.
